DetailedReport.Semantic: The signature validation process results into TOTAL-PASSED based on the following considerations: the format check succeeded; the cryptographic checks of the signature succeeded (including checks of hashes of individual data objects that have been signed indirectly); any constraints applicable to the signers certificate have been positively validated (e.g. the signing certificate consequently has been found trustworthy); and the signature has been positively validated against the validation constraints and hence is considered conformant to these constraints.
